title: Smart Task Management Feature

overview.problem_statement: Users struggle to prioritize and manage their daily tasks effectively, leading to decreased productivity and missed deadlines.
overview.solution_summary: Implement an AI-powered task management system that automatically prioritizes tasks, suggests optimal scheduling, and provides intelligent reminders.
overview.target_audience: Professionals and teams who manage multiple projects and tasks daily
overview.market_context: Task management market is growing 15% annually with increasing demand for intelligent automation

user_personas.name: Busy Professional
user_personas.description: Mid-level manager juggling multiple projects and deadlines
goals: Reduce time spent on task management

user_stories.story: As a busy professional, I want the system to automatically prioritize my tasks so that I can focus on the most important work first
acceptance_criteria: System analyzes task deadlines, importance, and dependencies
Tasks are automatically reordered based on priority algorithm
User can override automatic prioritization if needed

user_stories.story: As a team member, I want intelligent scheduling suggestions so that I can optimize my daily schedule
acceptance_criteria: Suggests optimal time blocks for different types of tasks

functional.description: System shall provide automatic task prioritization based on deadline, importance, and dependencies
System shall integrate with calendar applications to suggest optimal scheduling
System shall provide intelligent reminders and notifications

non_functional.description: Task prioritization algorithm must complete within 2 seconds
non_functional.acceptance_criteria: Load testing shows 95th percentile response time < 2 seconds

non_functional.description: Interface must be intuitive with minimal learning curve
non_functional.acceptance_criteria: User testing shows 90% task completion rate without training

technical_specifications.architecture_overview: Microservices architecture with machine learning pipeline for intelligent prioritization and scheduling
security_considerations: End-to-end encryption for sensitive task data
OAuth 2.0 authentication with major calendar providers
GDPR compliance for user data handling

milestones.name: MVP Development
milestones.description: Core task management and basic prioritization

milestones.name: AI Integration
milestones.description: Machine learning algorithm for intelligent prioritization

milestones.name: Calendar Integration
milestones.description: Integration with Google Calendar, Outlook, and Apple Calendar

risks.description: Machine learning algorithm may not achieve target accuracy
risks.mitigation_strategy: Extensive training data collection and algorithm tuning

risks.description: Calendar API limitations may restrict functionality
risks.mitigation_strategy: Early API testing and fallback solutions

assumptions: Users are willing to grant calendar access permissions
Third-party APIs will remain stable during development
User adoption of AI-suggested prioritization will be high

out_of_scope: Project management features (Gantt charts, resource allocation)
